about.title: About me
description: I am a motivated Backend Web Developer with a robust background in Natural Sciences (PhD Marine Ecology) and a strong passion for technology and data analysis. Over

years of professional experience in backend development using Python and Django, complemented by a solid foundation in statistical analysis and database management. Proactive and self-taught, proficient in R and Python, seeking new challenges in data analysis and science beyond natural sciences. I believe I have made a good transition to web application development, which demonstrates my ability to adapt and learn new technologies, applying knowledge in a new discipline.

work.title: Backend Web Developer
content: Design and development of efficient, secure, and scalable solutions, leveraging full-stack programming skills and agile methodologies.
Implementation of advanced features:
Secure authentication systems (2FA email and app, password validators).
Multi-region support and robust permission management.
Automated ID generation and optimized admin interfaces.
Integrated Google Maps API for interactive location-based features.
Implemented PDF rendering with digital signature support to enhance document security.
Enhanced user experience through:
Responsive design and CSS styling.
Reusable components, interactive maps, file uploads, and image galleries.
Key technologies: Django, Django REST Framework, PostgreSQL (PostGIS), Redis, Docker, and Bootstrap.
Focused on delivering high-quality, user-centric solutions, improving performance, security, and scalability.

work.title: Technical Specialist
content: Led the development, maintenance, and analysis of Spain's allochthonous species database, integrating data from international sources (GBIF, WORMS, FishBase, AlgaeBase) via APIs, web scraping (R, Python), and field campaigns.
Spearheaded cumulative impact assessments for Marine Spatial Planning (MSP) in the Western Mediterranean, designing data-driven scenarios using:
QGIS
ArcGIS
R
Python
PostgreSQL
Coordinated cross-border policy recommendations, aligning spatial uses (fisheries, conservation zones) with regulatory frameworks in collaboration with EU Member States and stakeholders.
Managed activities for the MSPMED project, contributing to scientific publications, budget oversight, and multinational workshops.
Technical skills:
Data automation (R, Python)
GIS-based spatial analysis
PostgreSQL database management
Published research in peer-reviewed journals, enhancing academic impact and supporting evidence-based policy decisions.
Developed resilience and time-management skills in fast-paced, multidisciplinary environments, particularly during offshore campaigns and high-stakes EU-funded initiatives.
